```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(odbc)
library(DBI)
library(usmap)
library(ggplot2)

```

Connect to Database

```{r}

con <- DBI::dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), Driver = "SQL Server", 
                      Server = "MSI\\SQLEXPRESS", Database = "testProjectWind", 
                      Trusted_Connection = "True")
```

Run query and plot data from it

```{r}

testData <- dbGetQuery(con, 'SELECT "Operating Year", "Number of Turbines" FROM dbo.WindCap2017')
summary(testData)

plot(testData)

StateTotals <- dbGetQuery(con, 'SELECT State as state, Sum("Nameplate Capacity (MW)") AS NC FROM dbo.WindCap2017
GROUP BY State ORDER BY NC DESC')
names(StateTotals)

plot_usmap(data = StateTotals, values = "NC") + 
  scale_fill_continuous(low = "white", high = "green") +
  labs(title = "Total Wind Capacity by State")


ggplot(data = StateTotals, mapping = aes(x = state, y = NC), position = position_dodge2(width = 20)) +
  geom_col()


```
